description: Define v1 workflow bundle format header fields (format, formatVersion, exportedAt).
Define v1 workflow bundle schema for workflow metadata, draft, and published versions.
Choose and enforce a stable workflow identifier field in the bundle (e.g. key).
Define canonical JSON export rules (stable key ordering, indentation, trailing newline).
Add JSON Schema file at ee/docs/schemas/workflow-bundle.v1.schema.json.
Add human-readable spec at ee/docs/guides/workflows/workflow-import-export.md.
Add workflow_definitions.key (portable workflow identifier) with uniqueness to support bundle import/export semantics.
Implement server-side exporter for a single workflow (metadata + draft + published versions).
Implement server-side exporter for a bundle of selected workflows.
Exporter excludes instance-specific audit fields by default (timestamps, actor ids).
Exporter includes operational workflow settings needed for behavior fidelity (paused, visibility, concurrency, retention, auto-pause thresholds).
Exporter emits dependency summary (actions, node types, schema refs) derived from definitions.
Implement server-side importer that validates formatVersion matches the accepted version.
Importer validates bundle JSON against the v1 JSON Schema.
Importer performs dependency validation and returns structured missing-dependency errors.
Importer runs all DB writes in a single transaction and rolls back on any error.
Importer creates workflow_definitions records from bundle entries (draft + metadata).
Importer creates workflow_definition_versions records for included published versions.
Importer is create-only by default and fails if a workflow with the same key exists.
Importer supports force overwrite: delete existing workflow by key and recreate from bundle with regenerated workflow_id.
Importer returns a clear summary of changes (created/deleted workflows and created versions).
Add export HTTP endpoint for a single workflow (returns bundle JSON).
Add import HTTP endpoint for workflow bundle JSON.
Restrict import/export endpoints to appropriate auth/role (admin-only) and/or test-only wiring as decided.
Add CLI tool under tools/ for workflow bundle import/export (wraps the API).
Add test fixture bundles in-repo for at least one representative workflow (control flow + action calls).
Add round-trip canonicalization utility used by exporter and tests.
